paper::SYNAPSE_REGISTER ( paper_ChangeAuth  )

Change authentication and authorisation info.

  • key The key to change or add. Specify an empty key to set the default rights.
  • description Description of the key
  • rights.chat User can chat.
  • rights.view User can view the drawing.
  • rights.cursor User can send cursor updates (other people with view-rights see the cursor, so you can point at stufF)
  • rights.change User can change the drawing.
  • rights.owner User is owner and can change rights
paper::SYNAPSE_REGISTER ( paper_Authenticate  )

Try to authenticate client with key.

  • key The key to autenticate with.
Sends reply: paper_Authorized when key was ok.
Sends reply: paper_AuthWrongKey when key was not found.
